description: Send simple desktop notifications when Gemini CLI operations complete. Works on macOS and Linux systems.

hooks.command: if command -v osascript >/dev/null 2>&1; then osascript -e 'display notification "Tool: $CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME completed" with title "Gemini CLI"'; elif command -v notify-send >/dev/null 2>&1; then notify-send 'Gemini CLI' "Tool: $CLAUDE_TOOL_NAME completed"; fi
